name: cryptotool-extension
description: Comprehensive Chrome extension for cryptographic operations

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test: echo 'Tests will be added as algorithms are implemented' && exit 0
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting will be added with development dependencies' && exit 0
scripts.watch: echo 'Watch mode for development' && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run package

author: CryptoTool Extension
